snippet: United States captain Jim Courier is "tired" of losing in the first round of the Davis Cup but says he feels no extra pressure ahead of a tough away encounter against a resurgent Australia....
lead_paragraph: United States captain Jim Courier is "tired" of losing in the first round of the Davis Cup but says he feels no extra pressure ahead of a tough away encounter against a resurgent Australia.

headline.print_headline: U.S. 'Tired' of Early Davis Cup Exits, Says Courier
headline.main: U.S. 'Tired' of Early Davis Cup Exits, Says Courier
